entry.title: Mason Jar Matcha Green- 70G
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Green Tea
Price: 24.99


Tea will be packed in a zero waste 250ML mason jar.

There is perhaps no tea on today's market as celebrated or as famous as Matcha.

Once upon a time Matcha was left for the very special Japanese Tea Ceremony. 

But we've relaxed our use of matcha.  It can be served cold, added to your favourite smoothie, baked good or make yourself a latte.

Our matcha is made from the Gyokuro leaves that have been shaded under special shade covers for 3 weeks giving the leaves a rich green colour.  Once plucked, the leaves are steamed and dried then stone ground powder.

Matcha has three times the amount of antioxidants of regular green tea.

Hot Tea: Use 1/2 teaspoon per 8 ounces of hot water.  Mix vigorously to make a smooth paste-like liquid.  Enjoy as is or top with freshly steamed milk and sweeten to taste.

Ingredients: Green Tea

Grown: Japan and Kenya

entry.title: Mason Jar Kenyan Chai Black Tea- 70g-New
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Black Tea
Price: 11.00

 ‘Chai’ actually just means ‘tea’, but here in the west, we have adopted the term to mean spiced tea. Our Kenyan Chai is spiced with a unique bouquet of cloves, cinnamon, fennel and rose petals. Totally different from a spicy Indian Masala Chai, this has been known to make chai devotees rethink how they drink their chai! Also delicious as an iced tea!

Packed in a zero waste reusable 250ml mason jar

Non GMO, Rain Forest Certified and Fair Trade Certified.

Tasting Notes: Sweet and Spicy 

Steeping Instructions: 1 teaspoon per 8 ounces water – 205°F – 3 mins

Natural Ingredients: Rainforest Alliance Kenyan Black tea, allspice, clove, fennel, cinnamon, licorice root, ginger, black pepper, rose petals.

Caffeine: Medium

entry.title: Mason Jar Purple Rain Leaf Tea-45G
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Purple Tea Blend
Price: 10.00

 

Packed in a zero waste 250ML mason jar.  

Purple Rain: A cup of Purple Rain will make your taste buds sing. Enjoy this bright tropical infusion of juicy passion fruit, sweet lemongrass, crisp apple, and a hint of hibiscus. Iced tea heaven! Wonderful hot.

Non GMO, Rain Forest Certified and Fair Trade Certified.

Tasting Notes: Bright & Lively. Tropical Fruit & Hibiscus

Makes 40 cups. Re-steep this whole leaf tea for 80 cups

Steeping Instructions: 1 Teaspoon –190°F – 4 mins

100% Natural Ingredients: Organic Lemongrass, Kenyan Purple Tea, Hibiscus, Apple Pieces, Rosehips, Natural Passion Fruit Flavour.

Caffeine: Low

Features: Did you know that all tea comes from the jade green leaves of the tea tree, except for purple tea? This unique variety yields beautiful, vibrant purple leaves! Grown organically, these tea leaves are naturally purple because they contain anthocyanins, the same super antioxidants found in other purple plants like blueberries and pomegranates. Similar to green tea, Purple Tea is very healthy, with little caffeine and an exquisite taste. Your purchase directly employs Kenyan tea farmers.

entry.title: Mason Jar Kenyan Oolong-60G
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Oolong
Price: 10.00

Tea will be packed in a zero waste 250ML mason jar.  

A rare find from Kenya, this oolong tea is meticulously crafted in small batches.  Hand-plucked, withered, tossed, panned, rolled and then dried, these complex processing steps result in an exquisite cup of tea.  Enjoy!

Non GMO, Rain Forest Certified and Fair Trade Certified.

Tasting Notes: Smooth floral flavours with a hint of honey

Steeping Instructions: 1 tea spoon – 190°F – 3 mins. Re steep 2-3 times

Ingredients: Kenyan Oolong Tea

Medium Caffeine

Features:
The only tea from Kenya plucked, processed and shipped from small-scale farmers! Pesticide free. No chemicals are ever sprayed on the tea leaves.
Artisanal tea leaves… You will be amazed at the giant tea leaves steeping deliciousness in your cup.  Once unfurled, you can see the actual whole leaf that the farmer carefully hand-plucked from their Nandi Hills tea garden.

entry.title: Mason Jar Creme Earl Grey-50G
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Black Tea
Price: 9.00

Tea will be packed in a zero waste reusable 250ML mason jar.

Our flavory Earl Grey mellowed with a delicious creamy taste. Enjoy anytime of day. 

This tea makes delicious Earl Grey Shortbread cookies!

Earl Grey Shortbread Cookies

Ingredients 

2 cups all purpose flour

2 tablespoons Grand River Tea Earl Grey Crème tea leaves

½ teaspoon salt

¾ cup confectioners’ sugar

1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract

1 cup butter room temperature

 

Directions

In a food processor, pulse together the flour, tea and salt until the tea is just spotted throughout the flour.

Add the confectioners sugar, vanilla, and butter. Pulse together just until a dough is formed.

Place dough on a sheet of plastic wrap and roll into a log about 2 ½ inches in diameter. Tightly twist each end of wrap and chill in refrigerator for 30 minutes.

Preheat oven to 375 degrees F 

Slice the log into 1/3 inch thick disks. Place on parchment lined baking sheets 2 inches apart. 

Bake until the edges are just brown about 12 minutes. Let cool for 5 minutes then transfer to wire racks and cool to room temperature. 

Enjoy!!!!!

Ingredients: Black tea, Cornflower petals, Natural flavours 

Grown: Sri Lanka

Steeping Instructions: 1 teaspoon per 8 ounces water – 205°F – 3 mins

Caffeine: Medium
